comment: Ryburn would be an excellent Spanish professor - if I wasn't taking SPAN1001. She taught this introductory Spanish course almost exclusively speaking in Spanish, so many times it was difficult to understand. She is very kind and lenient with grading, however. I would recommend her for a higher level Spanish course, but not an introductory course.

She is such an amazing professor. It is full immersion but it's very understandable and she is sooo patient with you. There is hw and projects, but they are easy. Attendance matters because there is a grade for that. She is really patient and will do anything to help you get a good grade in the class. TAKE HER!

She was one of the nicest and most loving teachers I have ever had and I really mean it. It was a synchronous class because of Covid, but she did our best to help us learn and do well. Attendance not mandatory, but recommended because she may give you points for extra credit. I love her and hope to take her again.

Super easy class! I had her class in the fall, and as long as you show up, talk at least once in class, and do HW then you will get an A. She's caring and understanding. Every time u participate in class it adds a point to either your quiz or test!
Profe Ryburn is amazing. Would love to take again. Caring, helpful, overall great.
Super sweet and caring. If you do the homework and show up you won't have a problem.

Ryburn is a great professor. She gives her students many chances to pull their grades up by giving extra credits. She does give out lots of homework but if you miss a HW let her know which one it was & shell reopen it for you. Shell go to the end of the world to help her students pass and Ive seen it happen with some students who were failing.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Her class was a nice mix of 3 tests, 3 quizzes, 1 final, and 3 oral projects. They were all simple. You will pass this class as long as you do all of the online homework and participate in class. Try not to skip a class because the material is mainly taught to you through powerpoint presentations which she uploads online, but it's mainly pictures.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Very sweet lady! Make sure to go to every class and homework can be hard, but overall it is an easy class
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Get ready to read

comment: Love Profesora Ryburn! My Spanish has improved so much because of her class. Spanish is used 99.9% of the time. It forces you to speak and think in the language. She is patient with those who are not strong speakers. Those who struggle in the beginning show a significant improvement at the end of the semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I struggled in this class because I skipped Spanish 1, but Professor Ryburn always made sure to take time to explain if anyone was confused. Volunteer to participate and you get points added to a test or quiz you fail. LOTS of homework online.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Professora Ryburn is wonderful. I can count on one hand how many times she spoke English but I didnt mind. Readings and homework for every class as well as a quiz every week and attendance counts. Some material was boring, but theres in class group work, 2 compositions, and a presentation. Overall a great class with a funny & great professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Participation matters

comment: OMG!!!! She's amazing and very understanding and goes to the end of the world to help you!! TAKE HER!!!!!!
She gives you many opportunities to pass in her class, best professor yet.

My first time learning a language so this class was difficult from the start. Great teacher, everything is online, lectures are straightforward. She is willing to help if you need it. Hw heavy. Plenty of opportunities to pass this class, just need to work for it. She's caring: wants all her students to succeed. Would recommend for Spanish 1101.
She was an amazing Span1001 teacher!
TAKE HER TAKE HER TAKE HER!!!! SHE IS AN AMAZING PROFESSOR

Most genuine professor I've had. Took her for 1001 & 02. She wants every single student to succeed and will help if you are willing to put in the effort. Online homework, but not hard. Tests and quizzes in class are identical to study guides she reviews the class before. If you talk in class  EXTRA CREDIT!!! AMAZING AMAZING PROFESSOR
It is learning another language, so it will be relatively difficult. But this professor makes it tolerable. She is really caring and really wants you to succeed. Amazing professor, Please, TAKE HER!
She's an amazing teacher! Doesn't make you feel dumb at all and loves to help her students! Compositions are group based, and homework is all online. Overall, great class and amazing teacher.

DO THE HOMEWORK!! if you don't it will literally kill your grade. 1 in class presentation, 3 Major test, a few quizzes. Quizzes should be an easy grade cause she goes over what will be on the quiz the day before and if you write everything down that is the quiz word for word. *WRITE AS MANY STARS NEAR YOUR NAME WILL HELP IN END EXTRA POINTS

Ryburn was a great Spanish teacher. As long as you attend class you will pass the class. She gave points toward grades when you answer questions in class. Her test were what she would go over the class before. Her compositions were far and homework was open all semester  basically.

Ryburn is such a good teacher!! She does have a spanish accent when speaking english, however she is very helpful and loves to teach! She doesn't make you feel dumb when you ask questions, and she answers them very clearly. Homework is all online but super easy. Take her!!
